ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Sr. Oracle Developer at Ebay Enterprise Ltd. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Oracle, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle Forms, SQL, Oracle 10G, Oracle Report, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Microsoft Office, UNIX, TOAD, Microsoft Outlook, Oracle 9i, SQLPlus, PeopleSoft, Oracle Toad, Oracle ERP, HTML, Stored Procedures, SMS, Oracle Projects, Oracle Pro-C, Oracle Payroll, Oracle Applications, Oracle 11g, Oracle 10g Application Server, ORACLE E-business, Lotus Notes/Domino, HRMS, GUI Applications, Client/Server. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
